contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 12, 1950 D Woodfalls Contest (Second Section)
Woodfalls Contest (Second Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
woodfalls-contest-second-section
None
Town House Grounds, Redlynch, Wiltshire March contest - 1st Lockerley, 2nd Burley, 3rd Downton. Hymn tune contest held in conjunction with all other sections- 1st Aldbourne, 2nd Branksome and Parkstone, 3rd Bristol Aeroplane Works, 4th Downton Silver. Best cornet - Downton. Best horn and euphonium - Burley. 1st annual contest promoted by Woodfalls Band.
Feb. 21, 2014, 4:28 p.m. Feb. 21, 2014, 4:34 p.m.
1 Lockerley Silver Band H. J. Stockwell
2 Downton Band A. R. Woodford
3 Burley Silver S. E. Crutcher
